committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise the method of determining cost-of living increases payable to Congressional, Federal, and military annuitants.

summary.text: Amends the Foreign Service Act of 1946, the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement Act of 1964, the Policemen and Firemen's Retirement and Disability Act, and other provisions of Federal law to revise the method of determining cost-of-living increases payable to congressional, Federal, military, and District of Columbia police, firefighter, and teacher annuitants.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise the method of determining cost-of living increases payable to Congressional, Federal, and military annuitants.
